Key Match Events: Aaron Judge's single in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees were facing a potential sweep
The Yankees' bullpen was taxed heavily over the past three games
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees' victory was described as'monumentally huge'

Others: The Yankees will turn to ace Gerrit Cole on Wednesday
